name: QuestORama (for the PCVR)
description:
This is the PC-VR, Oculus Rift version of my Oculus Quest game, QuestORama. I made this for people interested in the game, but who do not currently own a Quest. You will need an Oculus Rift though, as it doesn't currently have button layouts for a VIVE. It *might* work with a Windows Mixed Reality headset, I don't know. 

It has some features the Quest version does not due to hardware limitations, like more robots roaming the map and shadows.
